markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 374 2.0 **Domain** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73) **Range** 60 feet **Target** 1 creature **Defense** AC --- You evoke a magical stone and throw it, with divine guide to your aim. The stone deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage depending on your spell attack roll against the target's AC. **Critical Success** The target takes double damage and you can [push](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) it up to 10 feet.
**Success** The target takes full damage and you can push it up to 5 feet. --- **Heightened (+1)** The stone's damage increases by 1d6.
name: Hurtling Stone

text: Hurtling Stone Single Action Source Player Core pg. 374 2.0 Domain Earth Range 60 feet Target 1 creature Defense AC --- You evoke a magical stone and throw it, with divine guide to your aim. The stone deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage depending on your spell attack roll against the target's AC. Critical Success The target takes double damage and you can push it up to 10 feet. Success The target takes full damage and you can push it up to 5 feet. --- Heightened (+1) The stone's damage increases by 1d6.
